analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.addtokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x4420681bda548cddb90d0e2419b9c52ec2ca7c9f.sol#333-342):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(0x49B25aDDdd6503d275375C7c261A444862360396,100000000 * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/18/0x4420681bda548cddb90d0e2419b9c52ec2ca7c9f.sol#336-341)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- addtok (/unique_chucks/18/0x4420681bda548cddb90d0e2419b9c52ec2ca7c9f.sol#342)

Crowdsale.addtokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x4420681bda548cddb90d0e2419b9c52ec2ca7c9f.sol#333-342) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(0x49B25aDDdd6503d275375C7c261A444862360396,100000000 * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/18/0x4420681bda548cddb90d0e2419b9c52ec2ca7c9f.sol#336-341)

Crowdsale.claim (/unique_chucks/18/0x4420681bda548cddb90d0e2419b9c52ec2ca7c9f.sol#344-364) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,reward * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/18/0x4420681bda548cddb90d0e2419b9c52ec2ca7c9f.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/18/0x4420681bda548cddb90d0e2419b9c52ec2ca7c9f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/18/0x4420681bda548cddb90d0e2419b9c52ec2ca7c9f.sol#1): it allows old versions
